patch 8.2.1459: Vim9: declaring script var in script does not infer the type

Problem:    Vim9: declaring ascript variable at the script level does not
            infer the type.
Solution:   Get the type from the value. (closes #6716)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1459: Vim9: declaring script var in script does not infer t… · vim/vim@53b29e4
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1459: Vim9: declaring script var in script does not infer t… · vim/vim@53b29e4
attachments.text: …he type Problem: Vim9: declaring ascript variable at the script level does not infer the type. Solution: Get the type from the value. (closes #6716)

Solution:   use "del" instead of $(DEL).

Solution:   Generate constant before checking type.  Add tets.

attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: crash when using typecast before constant. Solution: Generate constant before checking type. Add tets.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/41fab3eac80893fd203663fc6a7ded09b04b633f|patch 8.2.1451: Vim9: list type at script level only uses first item>
patch 8.2.1451: Vim9: list type at script level only uses first item

Problem:    Vim9: list type at script level only uses first item.
Solution:   Use all members, like in a compiled function. (closes #6712)
            Also for dictionary.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1451: Vim9: list type at script level only uses first item · vim/vim@41fab3e
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1451: Vim9: list type at script level only uses first item · vim/vim@41fab3e
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: list type at script level only uses first item. Solution: Use all members, like in a compiled function. (closes #6712) Also for dictionary.

<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/7517ffdbb564250de72ee3ef64fecf4a486df519|patch 8.2.1446: Vim9: line number in error message is not correct>
patch 8.2.1446: Vim9: line number in error message is not correct

Problem:    Vim9: line number in error message is not correct.
Solution:   Set SOURCING_LNUM before calling emsg(). (closes #6708)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1446: Vim9: line number in error message is not correct · vim/vim@7517ffd
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1446: Vim9: line number in error message is not correct · vim/vim@7517ffd
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: line number in error message is not correct. Solution: Set SOURCING_LNUM before calling emsg(). (closes #6708)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/c4ce36d48698669f81ec90f7c9dc9ab8c362e538|patch 8.2.1445: Vim9: function expanded name is cleared when sourcing…>
patch 8.2.1445: Vim9: function expanded name is cleared when sourcing again

Problem:    Vim9: function expanded name is cleared when sourcing a script
            again.
Solution:   Only clear the expanded name when deleting the function.
            (closes #6707)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1445: Vim9: function expanded name is cleared when sourcing… · vim/vim@c4ce36d
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1445: Vim9: function expanded name is cleared when sourcing… · vim/vim@c4ce36d
attachments.text: … again Problem: Vim9: function expanded name is cleared when sourcing a script again. Solution: Only clear the expanded name when deleting the function. (closes #6707)
